                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The episodes of the cartoon *Phineas and Ferb* called *The Fast and the
Phineas* and *Lawn Gnome Beach Party of Terror*. This is ripped from the new
DVD called *The Fast and the Phineas*. The release name comes from the aired
episode numbers and are in the order of what episode is when in this rip. This
only has the one set of credits as the DVD has them as if both A and B episodes
were aired together. This is 175MB so wont fit on a disc with the single
episodes, but will with releases with these type of ones. This release also
includes English subtitles for the hard of hearing. Enjoy! =D
